Text: victor kelly Cc Dear Mr Lay i have just returned home after picking up Victor at ShepherdKirby and bringing him to the grocery store He shared with me that you had stopped to say hi and gave him from your wallet This email is to convey my warmest personal thanks to you for your generosity to those less fortunate i have paid for an apartment on Commonwealth for years for him and check on him every dayhe has also volunteered his time and efforts to several of my former work projects JDF MS etc i will be going into redeployment next monday and hopefully will be fortunate enough to stay on at ENRON If it doesnt work out please know that I am grateful for the years I spent there the company has treated me very well and i will always remain loyal and dedicated to you I applaud your integrity and ethics should you ever need any volunteer assistance please call me at Sincerely Deb Gebhardt Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp
